attributes.action: Commission the Building of a State Yacht
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Although not an ardent royalist I was ashamed to see The Queen, our Head of State having to carry out the 2002 fleet review on what looked like a red leaded bath tub, when the fleet being reviewed comprised of so many elegant vessels. The cost could be met by a mix of public, private & one off lottery funds and should be built in a British yard so providing employment. It could be used on state and important diplomatic occasions. The cost & maintenance would not be that great compared with the money being wasted on many other projects which do not bring the pride to the nation that this would.
